values.selectFeatureMessage: Choose a stop from the table or map.
values.helpDialogContent:
Adopt-A-Stop Manager can be used by transit agencies to approve adoption requests, view adopter details, and information submitted by adopters such as when an adopted stop was last cleaned. 

Click filter next to the column name to filter records in the table. To view and edit a report, click on one of the records in the table. The details of that report will load in the lower left corner in the Details tab. To edit the report, click Edit Record in the right corner of the Details tab. Modify the settings and then click Save when you are done.

values.title: {{solution.title}}

settings.markdown:
Adopt-A-Stop

Providing a safe and comfortable location for bus riders as they wait for their ride
You can help us keep transit stops safe and clean for riders in our community.

Volunteers
0

How It Works

Keeping our stops safe and clean has never been easier.

• Join Community

    Create your identity and review the volunteer resources.

  • Adopt Stop

    Identify one, or more, stops you would like to adopt.

  • Clean Regularly

    Clear debris and trash discovered near stop.

  • Report Status

    Report the status and condition of stops frequently.

Adopt a Stop

Use the Adopt-A-Stop app to join the community, adopt a bus stop and report the status regularly.



Adopt Stop

Frequently Asked Questions

Common questions you may be asking about our Adopt-A-Catch Stop program.

Report a Problem

The process of reporting a problem with a stop has never been easier.

Submit a Report

Use the Transit Rider Reporter Reporter app to report an issue with a stop. You can also offer a suggestion, ask a question, or give a compliment.


Submit Report

Contact Call Center

The Call Center is open 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, 365 days a year.  Call 555-555-5555 to submit a non-emergency problem.

Scheduled Events

Clean up and volunteer activities scheduled around the community.

Transit Data

Authoritative data uset to understand the transit system

Get Involved

Stay informed and learn how you can participate in volunteer programs.

item.title: {{solution.title}}
item.snippet: Adopt-A-Stop can be used to operate stop adoption programs that allow volunteers to adopt transit stops and clean them for the community.
item.description:
A transit ride begins and ends at a stop and a rider’s overall experience includes not only the ride, but their time spent at transit stops. Adopt-A-Stop programs seek to improve this experience and reduce maintenance costs by leveraging individual volunteers and organizations to clean transit stops. Program volunteers are typically asked to inspect their stops, remove trash, and report graffiti or serious damage at regular intervals. This simple action has a big impact on rider satisfaction, safety around the stop and the quality of life in a neighborhood. Adopt-A-Stop is typically implemented by transit agencies that want to engage the community and maximize the capacity of operations staff.

The Adopt-A-Stop solution delivers a set of capabilities that help you engage volunteers to keep transit stops clean, manage participants, and monitor the performance of the adoption program.

Learn More
